actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the authority for the flexible regulations of interest rates on deposits and accounts in depository institutions.

summary.text: Extends for one year, the authorization of regulation of maximum interest rates on deposits and accounts in depository institutions and of open market operations in agency agency issues by Federal Reserve banks.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authority for the flexible regulations of interest rates on deposits and accounts in depository institutions.
